features: FOR A LONG-LASTING GLOW: Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Radiant Lotion moisturizes skin for a long-lasting, radiant glow
FORMULATED WITH ULTRA-HYDRATING LIPIDS: This body lotion for dry skin is formulated with Pure Cocoa Butter and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids that fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture
FEEL THE DIFFERENCE: This body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin)
NON-GREASY FEEL: This fast-acting lotion absorbs quickly to leave your skin hydrated without feeling greasy
DAILY SKIN CARE: Use Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Radiant Body Lotion as your daily lotion for dry, rough skin. Just apply to your skin for long-lasting hydration and noticeably healthier skin
EQUITABLE SKIN CARE FOR ALL: Skin health is essential for well-being. We’re helping those underserved get better care for their skin
body.description: Made with Pure Cocoa Butter and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids, Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Radiant body Lotion for dry skin prevents dryness and helps keep your skin looking healthy and hydrated. With daily exposure to environmental triggers (like wind, lack of humidity, and sun), skin's natural moisture barrier can break down, allowing water to escape the skin. But the Ultra-Hydrating lipids in our Cocoa Radiant lotion fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture to allow the skin's natural barrier to recover. Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Radiant Lotion, formulated with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and Pure Cocoa Butter, moisturizes skin for a long-lasting, radiant glow. This body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin). This body lotion for dry skin absorbs fast for rich moisturization without the residue and provides 48-hour moisture. Use this dermatologist-tested body lotion daily on dry, rough skin for stronger, noticeably healthier skin. Just apply to your skin for long-lasting moisture. This Vaseline lotion bottle is made of 50% recycled plastic. Our ambition is to get to 100% recycled plastic in the near future. Since 2018, we've used 337 Metric Tons of recycled plastic across the Vaseline product portfolio in North America.

productInformation.name: Active Ingredients
productInformation.value: Water, Petrolatum, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Isopropyl Palmitate, Glycol Stearate, Dimethicone, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Dihydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Carbomer, Fragrance, Stearamide Amp, Triethanolamine, Methylparaben, Dmdm Hydantoin, Disodium Edta, Caramel, Titanium Dioxide. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Radiant Lotion, with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and Pure Cocoa Butter, moisturizes skin for a long-lasting, radiant glow. This body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin).

YOUR SKIN, GLOWING Give your skin the gift of long-lasting radiance and a delicious scent. HEAL YOUR DRY SKIN Infused with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids that fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture to support your skin’s natural repair process. NOURISHED SKIN FOR DAYS This rich, silky, non-greasy formula soothes dry skin and provides 48 hours of moisture. FEEL THE DIFERRENCE Heal dry skin with 90% more skin moisture compared to untreated skin. This rich formula contains Pure Cocoa Butter, known for its nourishing properties.

Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Radiant Spray Vaseline Lip Therapy Cocoa Butter Vaseline Petroleum Jelly Cocoa Butter Main Benefit Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Radiant Spray is formulated with 100% pure cocoa butter and is clinically proven to deeply moisturize dry skin and reveal its natural radiance. Made with 100% pure Vaseline Jelly, this is a lip balm you can rely on to provide long-lasting relief from dryness, dullness and cracked lips. This classic skin protectant, made with cocoa butter and triple-purified jelly, is great for dull skin and heals dry or cracked skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing scent and combats dry skin aggressively
reviews.reviewText: The Vaseline Intensive Care Body Lotion in Cocoa Radiant has become my go-to solution for combating dry skin, and the 4-pack is an absolute skincare game-changer. If you're on the lookout for a lotion that not only provides intense hydration but also leaves your skin with a radiant glow, look no further.The Cocoa Radiant formula is a true indulgence for the senses. The rich cocoa butter scent is both comforting and luxurious, creating a spa-like experience every time I apply it. The texture is silky-smooth, and it absorbs quickly into the skin without any greasy residue.What sets this body lotion apart is its ultra-hydrating lipids. My skin feels instantly moisturized and nourished, and the effects last throughout the day. Even in harsh weather conditions, the Vaseline Intensive Care lotion has proven to be a reliable shield against dryness, leaving my skin feeling soft, supple, and rejuvenated.The 4-pack is a fantastic value, ensuring that I always have a bottle within reach at home, in my bag, or at the office. The convenient pump dispenser makes application a breeze, and the compact size is perfect for on-the-go hydration.I've noticed a significant improvement in the overall texture and appearance of my skin since incorporating this lotion into my daily routine. It's gentle enough for everyday use and has become an essential part of my skincare regimen.In conclusion, the Vaseline Intensive Care Body Lotion in Cocoa Radiant is a stellar product for anyone seeking a reliable and effective solution for dry skin. Treat yourself to the nourishing benefits of this lotion – your skin will thank you! Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewText: Our family loves the smell and smoothness of this body lotion. It makes your skin feel so soft. It lasts throughout the day. We use it daily and notice a difference compared to what we were using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This lotion does a good job, not the best though. I think it’s worth it for the price. I use it every day when I get out of the shower and it helps. But my skin is still dry.
